availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married Ann Roberts. Father of William Roberts, Thomas P. Roberts, and Mattie Roberts. Farmer in Hancock County in 1860. Owned seventeen enslaved people in Hancock County in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Unnamed District, p. 94; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Unnamed District, p. 8.
